entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as having the time of his life and being greeted cordially by Ministry members.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as taking a box from Mr. Weasley and showing him how to light a match properly.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as having members who are hurrying up and down the thoroughfare.

relationships.description: Hermione helps Mr. Weasley light a match.
Ministry members greet Mr. Weasley cordially as they pass by.
